definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
ability to make one's own decisions
independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs

pinyin: zi4 zhu3 shen2 jing1 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: What is more, the author also tries to construct the senior chemistry teaching model of developing autonomous learning.
sentences.chinese: 作者还尝试构建了高中化学自主探究教学模式。

sentences.english: Our company is an enterprise which is invested by Hong Kong investor only and manages businesses independently.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是港商独资企业，自主经营进出口业务。

sentences.english: Self-developed products of Contec have been exported to more than 150 countries and regions.
sentences.chinese: 公司自主研发的产品已出口到150多个国家和地区。

sentences.english: This method is mainly applied for autonomous mobile vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 这一方法主要应用于自主式机动飞行器。

sentences.english: Falling in love is the paradigmatic example of  an involuntary  life-affecting desire.
sentences.chinese: 坠入爱河是一个欲望不由自主影响人生的经典案例。

sentences.english: For Obama Sr. this was an issue of national autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 在老奥巴马看来，这事关民族自主。

sentences.english: The dwarf could not help but think of Joffrey.
sentences.chinese: 侏儒不由自主想起了乔佛里。

sentences.english: First, China sticks to the principle of independence.
sentences.chinese: 第一，中国始终奉行独立自主的原则。

sentences.english: I saw this picture and couldn't resist posting it.
sentences.chinese: 我看到这张图片便不由自主地把它张贴出来。

sentences.english: I snorted a few mouthfuls of fresh air, but also puts on a minor involuntarily.
sentences.chinese: 我吸了几口新鲜空气，又不由自主地哼起了小调。

sentences.english: Self-directed learning may open a new avenue for us.
sentences.chinese: 自主学习的研究为此提供了一个思路。

sentences.english: Teachers use their mode of teaching to teach students.
sentences.chinese: 课堂中，教师用自主阅读的教学模式上英文报阅读课。

sentences.english: The rural country needs to form authority and decide the rights of developments dependently.
sentences.chinese: 乡村社会要形成权威，自主决定乡村教育的发展权。

sentences.english: You are a good catch if you are self-reliant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是一个独立自主的人，你就是一个抢手货。

sentences.english: The paper is accompanied with a self-developed software called LandSmart that is for facilitating calculating land demand and land-population sustainability.
sentences.chinese: 并自主设计出土地需求量和土地人口承载力预测软件。

sentences.english: But Jerusalem which is above is free, which is the mother of us all.
sentences.chinese: 但那在上的耶路撒冷是自主的，他是我们的母。

definition: because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
